resources.string: Adjust Hold Distance as best for you. \n See Instructions for more information.

\tHold the phone at eye level at the distance designated by Hold Distance away from your eyes. Adjust the two horizontal bars so that the flagpost just fits between them by moving the golf balls. I.e. position the actual flagpost in between the two bars like the blue flagpost on screen is positioned. \n\n \tYou can change the Actual Pin Height and Hold Distance parameters as needed. If you do not know the exact height that the flagposts are at your course, use the default value provided.
